name: Sunil Rana
title: MCA Student & Full Stack Developer

education.institution: Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering (DSCE), Bangalore

projects.name: Excel Analysis Platform (MERN + ML)
projects.description: Developed a full-stack MERN application to upload Excel files and provide insights, charts, summaries, row-level data, metadata, and analytics. Implemented JWT authentication with email-based password reset and integrated machine learning for advanced data insights.

projects.name: Expense Tracker (MERN)
projects.description: Built an end-to-end MERN expense tracker with JWT authentication, interactive dashboard, and category-based expense tracking.

projects.name: AI Chatbot (Gemini API)
projects.description: Developed a chatbot feature with fresh conversation resets, chat history, and a responsive UI for an enhanced experience.

projects.name: Diabetes Prediction (Machine Learning)
projects.description: Trained ML models (Linear Regression, Multiple Regression, Polynomial Regression) to predict diabetes based on health data (glucose, BMI, blood pressure, age).

work: Developed a Typing Accuracy Checker with real-time keypress feedback.
Created a Major → Minor Mapping Converter using HTML, JS, CSS, and Express.js.
Gained hands-on experience with front-end technologies and version control.

achievements: Solved 100+ coding challenges on LeetCode & GeeksforGeeks.
Participated in CodeSprint 2024 Hackathon, showcasing teamwork and problem-solving.
